name: monumental failure
summary: Monumental Failure is a historically (in)accurate physics-based monument construction simulator. The game empowers you to recreate some of the world's most impressive architectural feats using incredible, and hard-to-believe, construction techniques.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 休闲
  • 发行日期: 2017-1-18
